name: Dan Janosik
description: I do part-time open-source BTC work, scratching my own itches. This has included creating the popular [btc-rpc-explorer](https://github.com/janoside/btc-rpc-explorer), the LND-management tool [lnd-admin](https://github.com/janoside/lnd-admin) (formerly [lightning-rpc-explorer](https://github.com/janoside/lightning-rpc-explorer)), and contributing random PRs to popular BTC projects I use.
